title: The Grand Duke
tags: how to unlock the grand duke
content:
ard to safety. We should return to the submersible and speak with him.

Once you have escaped Iron Throne, talk to Duke Ravengard. He is overcome with a lot of emotions regarding his son when he sees him.

Have a heart- your son is a hero. We saved lives here today, including your own. Grand Duke Ravengard, Glad to see you of your own mind. You can work out your issues later. Go to our camp - the Absolute can't reach you there.

Talk to Ravengard.

We rescued Grand Duke Ravengard from the Iron T
